context: what instrument which is not included?
response: Not sure what exactly you're asking. This comes with the yoke and one 3-lever throttle. The other "instruments"  from Saitek (ADI, Heading, Alt) as well as the Saitek Pro Flight Rudder Pedals are sold separately

context: Does it come with the receiver ?
response: Mine came with a receiver,  I just wish the controller worked a bit more.

context: I have a Nintendo 3DS XL handheld player. Will this SuperMario 3D land play with my player? Thanks.
response: Yes the 3ds XL plays supermario 3d land :)

context: Can the left wheel trim be used as a throttle?
response: Yes. I used it like that until I bought a separate throttle. You'll want to be sure and make sure the throttle wheel is calibrated each time you fire up the machine because mine jumps around a bit, or build dead zone in the axis extremes to reduce throttle sensitivities in those areas.

context: Is this stick compatible with the saitek throttle quadrant?
response: Sorry I have no personal experience here.  I would Google this Question !  Best of Luck

context: does the wire get tangled easily?
response: No b/c it has a Velcro strap to keep all the loose wires all neat clean  and together

context: How much time you can play from a single battery charge?
response: It should be around 8 hours. Less than 10 hours I'm sure.

context: I can not tell from you image does this take the Wii to HDMI??
response: The cable is hd but this is a component cable is not hdmi...similar to the red yellow white components. Some tv's are high def and need the blue green red connection.

It did not work at all for me I have vista but give it a try it could've have been what I wanted it to work with which was computer game. Just know it did not work on the computer at all. Hope this helps.

context: Would this work on a New Zealand PS3?
response: Yes - this will work in NZ PS3 player.

context: Does anybody know if this adapter works for the Turbografx game system?
response: Yes, it will work IF you are using the RF adapter. If you don't have it anymore and you don't have the Turbo Boost/Plus or the CD-ROM attachment, I have used a standard cable to connect the RF to the TV using a original NES and Atari box. So you should not have any trouble.

context: Does this edition come with the Angel Wings for your character?
response: I have D3 Collector's Edition, so ,my character have angle wings along time.

context: Can you remove the orange keys and replace them with black ones (does the keyboard come with any)?
response: Keyboard doesn't come with extra keys - I would think if you wanted to you could remove them and replace them with black ones

context: I am not sure how to charge up the charger. What do I need?
response: It's quite easy. It has a micro usb port for charging. You can invert the cable and plug the usb to a pc or to your phone charger. Or, you can use any usb/microusb cable and plug to a pc or a phone charger with a usb port.

context: Can I play Civ without the disc once I loaded the game on the computer.
response: Typically not without finding a crack somewhere online. Most games require CD authentication unless you are using a platform like Steam or Origin.
